title: Dublin’s Housing First programme is on pause, raising questions about competitive tendering for social care services
content: “Housing First works best when it is high quality, consistent and for as long as necessary,” says Samara Jones, coordinator of the Housing First Europe Hub.

title: From smartphones to Roblox: six easy ways for parents to protect their children online
content: With age verification processes to protect children using social media being rolling out more slowly than was hoped, what are the options facing parents who want their children shielded from age-inappropriate content online – be it on social media or messaging apps?

title: Change to summer holidays would need consultation with parents, schools and teachers, says McEntee
content: Education Minister says summer holidays give ‘everybody a chance to take a break’

title: 'Not fit for purpose': Cork’s N25 slammed as unsafe with 5,000 homes now at risk
content: Officials warn lives, traffic, and housing plans are at risk as East Cork’s critical N25 road remains dangerously underfunded

title: Demolition of Smyth's pub in Dublin 4 for new venue and apartments gets green light
content: It comes despite concerns expressed by locals that a “super-pub” will be built in place of the existing “D4 gem”.
